EmailTemplate.name: Increase ROI with Billing Programs.Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Complimentary Webinar - Increase ROI with Your EMS Billing Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Complimentary Webinar Increase Return on Investment (ROI) with your EMS Billing Programs
Join us for a complimentary webinar on Increasing Your Return on Investment with Your EMS Billing Programs. This webinar will discuss how Larry Cole and TJ Irby, both EMS Billing experts, used their EMS Billing Programs to increase revenues in their respective services.
Learn how to use your EMS Billing system to:
- Help determine what your billing staff does each day or which crews/units have the longest on-scene/at-destination times
- Measure your KPIs
- Balance medication administered against supply requests
- Find areas of down-coding that can increase revenue
- Audit your calls for increased revenue (% of calls billed with a decimal mile) and decreased expenses (holding unnecessary emergency claims for a PCS)
DATE: October 20, 2011 TIME: 1 PM Central / 2 PM Eastern PRESENTER: Larry Cole and TJ Irby - EMS Billing Experts
Register Now: http://offers.tritech.com/IncreaseROIwithBillingPrograms_Registration.html
Questions? Cheri Lane, Marketing Communications Manager 800-537-3927, ext. #6278 cheri.lane@tritech.com
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com 9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121 l PH: 858.799.7000
